overview: Bothersome bedbugs are transformed into cute and cuddly companions who teach kids valuable life lessons in this educational series for toddlers and preschoolers. With the help of a vacuum cleaner pal who's cleverly named J. Edgar, precocious insect siblings Gooby, Toofy and Woozy learn how to solve a host of problems and make bedtime and clean-up lots of fun.
title: My Bedbugs: Let's Play
